Now the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> after their number<S>4557</S>, to wit, the chief<S>7218</S> fathers<S>1</S> and captains<S>8269</S> of thousands<S>505</S> and hundreds<S>3967</S>, and their officers<S>7860</S> that served<S>8334</S> the king<S>4428</S> in any matter<S>1697</S> of the courses<S>4256</S>, which came in<S>935</S> and went out<S>3318</S> month<S>2320</S> by month<S>2320</S> throughout all the months<S>2320</S> of the year<S>8141</S>, of every<S>259</S> course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
Over the first<S>7223</S> course<S>4256</S> for the first<S>7223</S> month<S>2320</S> was Jashobeam<S>3434</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zabdiel<S>2068</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
Of the children<S>1121</S> of Perez<S>6557</S> was the chief<S>7218</S> of all the captains<S>8269</S> of the host<S>6635</S> for the first<S>7223</S> month<S>2320</S>.
And over the course<S>4256</S> of the second<S>8145</S> month<S>2320</S> was Dodai<S>1737</S> an Ahohite<S>266</S>, and of his course<S>4256</S> was Mikloth<S>4732</S> also the ruler<S>5057</S>: in his course<S>4256</S> likewise were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>. <sup>Dodai: or, Dodo, 2.Sam.23.9.</sup>
The third<S>7992</S> captain<S>8269</S> of the host<S>6635</S> for the third<S>7992</S> month<S>2320</S> was Benaiah<S>1141</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jehoiada<S>3077</S>, a chief<S>7218</S> priest<S>3548</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>. <sup>chief: or, principal officer</sup>
This is that Benaiah<S>1141</S>, who was mighty<S>1368</S> among the thirty<S>7970</S>, and above the thirty<S>7970</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> was Ammizabad<S>5990</S> his son<S>1121</S>.
The fourth<S>7243</S> captain for the fourth<S>7243</S> month<S>2320</S> was Asahel<S>6214</S> the brother<S>251</S> of Joab<S>3097</S>, and Zebadiah<S>2069</S> his son<S>1121</S> after<S>310</S> him: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The fifth<S>2549</S> captain<S>8269</S> for the fifth<S>2549</S> month<S>2320</S> was Shamhuth<S>8049</S> the Izrahite<S>3155</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The sixth<S>8345</S> captain for the sixth<S>8345</S> month<S>2320</S> was Ira<S>5896</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Ikkesh<S>6142</S> the Tekoite<S>8621</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The seventh<S>7637</S> captain for the seventh<S>7637</S> month<S>2320</S> was Helez<S>2503</S> the Pelonite<S>6397</S>, of the children<S>1121</S> of Ephraim<S>669</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The eighth<S>8066</S> captain for the eighth<S>8066</S> month<S>2320</S> was Sibbecai<S>5444</S> the Hushathite<S>2843</S>, of the Zarhites<S>2227</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The ninth<S>8671</S> captain for the ninth<S>8671</S> month<S>2320</S> was Abiezer<S>44</S> the Anetothite<S>6069</S>, of the Benjamites<S>1145</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The tenth<S>6224</S> captain for the tenth<S>6224</S> month<S>2320</S> was Maharai<S>4121</S> the Netophathite<S>5200</S>, of the Zarhites<S>2227</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The eleventh<S>6249</S> <S>6240</S> captain for the eleventh<S>6249</S> <S>6240</S> month<S>2320</S> was Benaiah<S>1141</S> the Pirathonite<S>6553</S>, of the children<S>1121</S> of Ephraim<S>669</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>.
The twelfth<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> captain for the twelfth<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> month<S>2320</S> was Heldai<S>2469</S> the Netophathite<S>5200</S>, of Othniel<S>6274</S>: and in his course<S>4256</S> were twenty<S>6242</S> and four<S>702</S> thousand<S>505</S>. <sup>Heldai: or, Heled, Chap.11.30.</sup>
Furthermore over the tribes<S>7626</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: the ruler<S>5057</S> of the Reubenites<S>7206</S> was Eliezer<S>461</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zichri<S>2147</S>: of the Simeonites<S>8099</S>, Shephatiah<S>8203</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Maachah<S>4601</S>:
Of the Levites<S>3881</S>, Hashabiah<S>2811</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Kemuel<S>7055</S>: of the Aaronites<S>175</S>, Zadok<S>6659</S>:
Of Judah<S>3063</S>, Elihu<S>453</S>, one of the brethren<S>251</S> of David<S>1732</S>: of Issachar<S>3485</S>, Omri<S>6018</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Michael<S>4317</S>:
Of Zebulun<S>2074</S>, Ishmaiah<S>3460</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Obadiah<S>5662</S>: of Naphtali<S>5321</S>, Jerimoth<S>3406</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Azriel<S>5837</S>:
Of the children<S>1121</S> of Ephraim<S>669</S>, Hoshea<S>1954</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Azaziah<S>5812</S>: of the half<S>2677</S> tribe<S>7626</S> of Manasseh<S>4519</S>, Joel<S>3100</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Pedaiah<S>6305</S>:
Of the half<S>2677</S> tribe of Manasseh<S>4519</S> in Gilead<S>1568</S>, Iddo<S>3035</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zechariah<S>2148</S>: of Benjamin<S>1144</S>, Jaasiel<S>3300</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Abner<S>74</S>:
Of Dan<S>1835</S>, Azareel<S>5832</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Jeroham<S>3395</S>. These were the princes<S>8269</S> of the tribes<S>7626</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
But David<S>1732</S> took<S>5375</S> not the number<S>4557</S> of them from twenty<S>6242</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> and under<S>4295</S>: because the LORD<S>3068</S> had said<S>559</S> he would increase<S>7235</S> Israel<S>3478</S> like to the stars<S>3556</S> of the heavens<S>8064</S>.
Joab<S>3097</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Zeruiah<S>6870</S> began<S>2490</S> to number<S>4487</S>, but he finished<S>3615</S> not, because there fell wrath<S>7110</S> for it<S>2063</S> against Israel<S>3478</S>; neither was the number<S>4557</S> put<S>5927</S> in the account<S>4557</S> of the chronicles<S>1697</S> <S>3117</S> of king<S>4428</S> David<S>1732</S>. <sup>was: Heb. ascended</sup>
And over the king's<S>4428</S> treasures<S>214</S> was Azmaveth<S>5820</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Adiel<S>5717</S>: and over the storehouses<S>214</S> in the fields<S>7704</S>, in the cities<S>5892</S>, and in the villages<S>3723</S>, and in the castles<S>4026</S>, was Jehonathan<S>3083</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Uzziah<S>5818</S>:
And over them that did<S>6213</S> the work<S>4399</S> of the field<S>7704</S> for tillage<S>5656</S> of the ground<S>127</S> was Ezri<S>5836</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Chelub<S>3620</S>:
And over the vineyards<S>3754</S> was Shimei<S>8096</S> the Ramathite<S>7435</S>: over the increase of the vineyards<S>3754</S> for the wine<S>3196</S> cellars<S>214</S> was Zabdi<S>2067</S> the Shiphmite<S>8225</S>: <sup>over the increase: Heb. over that which was of the vineyards</sup>
And over the olive trees<S>2132</S> and the sycomore trees<S>8256</S> that were in the low plains<S>8219</S> was Baalhanan<S>1177</S> the Gederite<S>1451</S>: and over the cellars<S>214</S> of oil<S>8081</S> was Joash<S>3135</S>:
And over the herds<S>1241</S> that fed<S>7462</S> in Sharon<S>8289</S> was Shitrai<S>7861</S> the Sharonite<S>8290</S>: and over the herds<S>1241</S> that were in the valleys<S>6010</S> was Shaphat<S>8202</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Adlai<S>5724</S>:
Over the camels<S>1581</S> also was Obil<S>179</S> the Ishmaelite<S>3459</S>: and over the asses<S>860</S> was Jehdeiah<S>3165</S> the Meronothite<S>4824</S>:
And over the flocks<S>6629</S> was Jaziz<S>3151</S> the Hagerite<S>1905</S>. All these were the rulers<S>8269</S> of the substance<S>7399</S> which was king<S>4428</S> David's<S>1732</S>.
Also Jonathan<S>3083</S> David's<S>1732</S> uncle<S>1730</S> was a counsellor<S>3289</S>, a wise<S>995</S> man<S>376</S>, and a scribe<S>5608</S>: and Jehiel<S>3171</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Hachmoni<S>2453</S> was with the king's<S>4428</S> sons<S>1121</S>: <sup>scribe: or, secretary</sup> <sup>son: or, Hachmonite</sup>
And Ahithophel<S>302</S> was the king's<S>4428</S> counsellor<S>3289</S>: and Hushai<S>2365</S> the Archite<S>757</S> was the king's<S>4428</S> companion<S>7453</S>:
And after<S>310</S> Ahithophel<S>302</S> was Jehoiada<S>3077</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Benaiah<S>1141</S>, and Abiathar<S>54</S>: and the general<S>8269</S> of the king's<S>4428</S> army<S>6635</S> was Joab<S>3097</S>.
